@@ -0,0 +1,176 @@
+import { getFuncionarios } from "@/sqLite/SQLiteConecction";
+import { Ionicons } from '@expo/vector-icons';
+import { useIsFocused, useNavigation } from "@react-navigation/native";
+import { useEffect, useState } from "react";
+import { FlatList, StyleSheet, Text, TextInput, TouchableOpacity, View } from "react-native";
+
+export default function Home() {
+  const navigation = useNavigation();
+  const isFocused = useIsFocused();
+
+  const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState('');
+  const [allFuncionarios, setAllFuncionarios] = useState([]);
+  const [filteredFuncionarios, setFilteredFuncionarios] = useState([]);
+
+  useEffect(() => {
+    // Recarrega os dados sempre que a tela estiver em foco
+    if (isFocused) {
+      async function loadData() {
+        const funcionarios = await getFuncionarios();
+        setAllFuncionarios(funcionarios);
+        setFilteredFuncionarios(funcionarios);
+      }
+      loadData();
+    }
+  }, [isFocused]);
+
+  useEffect(() => {
+    const filtered = allFuncionarios.filter(func =>
+      func.nome.toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.toLowerCase())
+    );
+    setFilteredFuncionarios(filtered);
+  }, [searchQuery, allFuncionarios]);
+
+  return (
+    <View style={styles.container}>
+      <View style={styles.header}>
+        <Text style={styles.title}>Funcion√°rios</Text>
+        <TouchableOpacity
+          style={styles.addButton}
+          onPress={() => navigation.navigate('Employes')}
+        >
+          <Ionicons name="add" size={24} color="#fff" />
+          <Text style={styles.addButtonText}>Adicionar</Text>
+        </TouchableOpacity>
+      </View>
+
+      <View style={styles.searchContainer}>
+        <Ionicons name="search" size={20} color="#888" style={styles.searchIcon} />
+        <TextInput
+          style={styles.searchInput}
+          placeholder="Buscar por nome..."
+          placeholderTextColor="#888"
+          value={searchQuery}
+          onChangeText={setSearchQuery}
+        />
+      </View>
+
+      <FlatList
+        data={filteredFuncionarios}
+        keyExtractor={item => item.id.toString()}
+        renderItem={({ item }) => (
+          <View style={styles.listItem}>
+            <View>
+              <Text style={styles.listItemName}>{item.nome}</Text>
+              <Text style={styles.listItemDetails}>RE: {item.re} | Setor: {item.setor}</Text>
+            </View>
+          </View>
+        )}
+        ListEmptyComponent={<Text style={styles.emptyText}>Nenhum funcion√°rio encontrado.</Text>}
+        contentContainerStyle={{ paddingBottom: 20 }}
+      />
+
+      <TouchableOpacity
+        style={styles.fab}
+        onPress={() => navigation.navigate('Employes')}
+      >
+        <Ionicons name="add" size={30} color="#fff" />
+      />
+    </View>
+  );
+}
+
+const styles = StyleSheet.create({
+  container: {
+    flex: 1,
+    backgroundColor: '#F9FAFB',
+    paddingHorizontal: 20,
+    paddingTop: 20,
+  },
+  header: {
+    flexDirection: 'row',
+    justifyContent: 'space-between',
+    alignItems: 'center',
+    marginBottom: 20,
+  },
+  title: {
+    fontSize: 28,
+    fontWeight: 'bold',
+    color: '#333',
+  },
+  addButton: {
+    backgroundColor: '#007BFF',
+    flexDirection: 'row',
+    paddingHorizontal: 14,
+    paddingVertical: 8,
+    borderRadius: 20,
+    alignItems: 'center',
+  },
+  addButtonText: {
+    color: '#fff',
+    fontWeight: 'bold',
+    marginLeft: 6,
+  },
+  searchContainer: {
+    flexDirection: 'row',
+    alignItems: 'center',
+    backgroundColor: '#fff',
+    borderRadius: 10,
+    paddingHorizontal: 10,
+    borderWidth: 1,
+    borderColor: '#E2E8F0',
+    marginBottom: 20,
+  },
+  searchIcon: {
+    marginRight: 8,
+  },
+  searchInput: {
+    flex: 1,
+    height: 45,
+    fontSize: 16,
+    color: '#333',
+  },
+  listItem: {
+    backgroundColor: '#fff',
+    padding: 15,
+    borderRadius: 10,
+    marginBottom: 10,
+    borderWidth: 1,
+    borderColor: '#E2E8F0',
+    flexDirection: 'row',
+    justifyContent: 'space-between',
+    alignItems: 'center',
+  },
+  listItemName: {
+    fontSize: 17,
+    fontWeight: '600',
+    color: '#1E2A38',
+  },
+  listItemDetails: {
+    fontSize: 14,
+    color: '#666',
+    marginTop: 4,
+  },
+  emptyText: {
+    textAlign: 'center',
+    marginTop: 50,
+    color: '#777',
+    fontSize: 16,
+  },
+  fab: {
+    position: 'absolute',
+    width: 60,
+    height: 60,
+    alignItems: 'center',
+    justifyContent: 'center',
+    right: 20,
+    bottom: 20,
+    backgroundColor: '#007BFF',
+    borderRadius: 30,
+    elevation: 8,
+    shadowColor: '#000',
+    shadowRadius: 5,
+    shadowOpacity: 0.3,
+    shadowOffset: { height: 2, width: 0 },
+  },
+});

@@ -0,0 +1,235 @@
+import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react';
+import { View, Text, TouchableOpacity, FlatList, Modal, TextInput, StyleSheet, Alert, ScrollView } from 'react-native';
+import { Ionicons } from '@expo/vector-icons';
+import { useIsFocused, useNavigation } from '@react-navigation/native';
+import { LinearGradient } from 'expo-linear-gradient';
+import { addFuncionario, getFuncionarios } from '@/sqLite/SQLiteConecction';
+
+export default function Home() {
+  const navigation = useNavigation();
+  const isFocused = useIsFocused();
+
+  const [funcionarios, setFuncionarios] = useState([]);
+  const [modalVisible, setModalVisible] = useState(false);
+  const [newEmployee, setNewEmployee] = useState({ nome: '', re: '', setor: '' });
+
+  // Carrega os funcion√°rios do banco
+  const loadData = async () => {
+    const data = await getFuncionarios();
+    setFuncionarios(data);
+  };
+
+  useEffect(() => {
+    if (isFocused) loadData();
+  }, [isFocused]);
+
+  // Dados do dashboard
+  const total = funcionarios.length;
+  const setores = [...new Set(funcionarios.map(f => f.setor))];
+  const ultimos = funcionarios.slice(-3).reverse();
+
+  const handleAdd = async () => {
+    if (!newEmployee.nome || !newEmployee.re || !newEmployee.setor) {
+      return Alert.alert('Erro', 'Por favor, preencha todos os campos.');
+    }
+    await addFuncionario(newEmployee.nome, newEmployee.re, newEmployee.setor);
+    setNewEmployee({ nome: '', re: '', setor: '' });
+    setModalVisible(false);
+    await loadData();
+  };
+
+  return (
+    <LinearGradient colors={['#F5F9FF', '#FFFFFF']} style={styles.container}>
+      <ScrollView contentContainerStyle={styles.scrollContainer} showsVerticalScrollIndicator={false}>
+        <Text style={styles.greeting}>üëã Ol√°, bem-vindo!</Text>
+
+        {/* Se√ß√£o de vis√£o geral */}
+        <Text style={styles.sectionTitle}>üìä Vis√£o Geral</Text>
+        <View style={styles.cardsContainer}>
+          <View style={styles.card}>
+            <Ionicons name="people-outline" size={24} color="#007BFF" />
+            <Text style={styles.cardTitle}>Funcion√°rios</Text>
+            <Text style={styles.cardNumber}>{total}</Text>
+          </View>
+          <View style={styles.card}>
+            <Ionicons name="business-outline" size={24} color="#28A745" />
+            <Text style={styles.cardTitle}>Setores</Text>
+            <Text style={styles.cardNumber}>{setores.length}</Text>
+          </View>
+          <View style={styles.card}>
+            <Ionicons name="time-outline" size={24} color="#FFC107" />
+            <Text style={styles.cardTitle}>√öltimo cadastrado</Text>
+            <Text style={styles.cardSmall}>
+              {funcionarios.length > 0 ? funcionarios[funcionarios.length - 1].nome : '‚Äî'}
+            </Text>
+          </View>
+        </View>
+
+        {/* Setores cadastrados */}
+        <Text style={styles.sectionTitle}>üè≠ Setores</Text>
+        {setores.length > 0 ? (
+          <View style={styles.setoresContainer}>
+            {setores.map((s, i) => (
+              <View key={i} style={styles.setorBadge}>
+                <Text style={styles.setorText}>{s}</Text>
+              </View>
+            ))}
+          </View>
+        ) : (
+          <Text style={styles.emptyText}>Nenhum setor cadastrado ainda.</Text>
+        )}
+
+        {/* √öltimos adicionados */}
+        <Text style={styles.sectionTitle}>üïí √öltimos adicionados</Text>
+        {ultimos.length > 0 ? (
+          <FlatList
+            data={ultimos}
+            keyExtractor={item => item.id.toString()}
+            renderItem={({ item }) => (
+              <View style={styles.listItem}>
+                <Ionicons name="person-circle-outline" size={26} color="#007BFF" />
+                <View style={{ marginLeft: 10 }}>
+                  <Text style={styles.listItemName}>{item.nome}</Text>
+                  <Text style={styles.listItemDetails}>RE: {item.re} | {item.setor}</Text>
+                </View>
+              </View>
+            )}
+          />
+        ) : (
+          <Text style={styles.emptyText}>Nenhum funcion√°rio cadastrado.</Text>
+        )}
+
+        {/* A√ß√µes r√°pidas */}
+        <Text style={styles.sectionTitle}>‚öôÔ∏è A√ß√µes r√°pidas</Text>
+        <View style={styles.actionsContainer}>
+          <TouchableOpacity style={styles.actionButton} onPress={() => setModalVisible(true)}>
+            <Ionicons name="add-outline" size={22} color="#fff" />
+            <Text style={styles.actionText}>Adicionar</Text>
+          </TouchableOpacity>
+          <TouchableOpacity
+            style={[styles.actionButton, { backgroundColor: '#6C63FF' }]}
+            onPress={() => navigation.navigate('Employes')}
+          >
+            <Ionicons name="list-outline" size={22} color="#fff" />
+            <Text style={styles.actionText}>Ver Todos</Text>
+          </TouchableOpacity>
+        </View>
+      </ScrollView>
+
+      {/* Modal de cadastro */}
+      <Modal visible={modalVisible} animationType="slide" transparent={true} onRequestClose={() => setModalVisible(false)}>
+        <View style={styles.modalContainer}>
+          <View style={styles.modalView}>
+            <Text style={styles.modalTitle}>Adicionar Funcion√°rio</Text>
+            <TextInput
+              placeholder="Nome"
+              value={newEmployee.nome}
+              onChangeText={text => setNewEmployee({ ...newEmployee, nome: text })}
+              style={styles.modalInput}
+            />
+            <TextInput
+              placeholder="RE"
+              value={newEmployee.re}
+              onChangeText={text => setNewEmployee({ ...newEmployee, re: text })}
+              style={styles.modalInput}
+              keyboardType="numeric"
+            />
+            <TextInput
+              placeholder="Setor"
+              value={newEmployee.setor}
+              onChangeText={text => setNewEmployee({ ...newEmployee, setor: text })}
+              style={styles.modalInput}
+            />
+            <TouchableOpacity style={styles.modalButton} onPress={handleAdd}>
+              <Ionicons name="save-outline" size={20} color="#fff" style={{ marginRight: 6 }} />
+              <Text style={styles.modalButtonText}>Salvar</Text>
+            </TouchableOpacity>
+            <TouchableOpacity onPress={() => setModalVisible(false)} style={styles.cancelButton}>
+              <Text style={styles.cancelText}>Cancelar</Text>
+            </TouchableOpacity>
+          </View>
+        </View>
+      </Modal>
+    </LinearGradient>
+  );
+}
+
+const styles = StyleSheet.create({
+  container: { flex: 1 },
+  scrollContainer: { padding: 20, paddingBottom: 50 },
+  greeting: { fontSize: 24, fontWeight: '700', color: '#1E2A38', marginBottom: 15 },
+  sectionTitle: { fontSize: 18, fontWeight: '600', color: '#1E2A38', marginTop: 20, marginBottom: 10 },
+  cardsContainer: { flexDirection: 'row', justifyContent: 'space-between', flexWrap: 'wrap', gap: 10 },
+  card: {
+    backgroundColor: '#fff',
+    flexBasis: '31%',
+    padding: 15,
+    borderRadius: 12,
+    alignItems: 'center',
+    borderWidth: 1,
+    borderColor: '#E2E8F0',
+  },
+  cardTitle: { fontSize: 14, color: '#555', marginTop: 8 },
+  cardNumber: { fontSize: 22, fontWeight: '700', color: '#1E2A38', marginTop: 4 },
+  cardSmall: { fontSize: 14, fontWeight: '600', color: '#1E2A38', marginTop: 4 },
+  setoresContainer: { flexDirection: 'row', flexWrap: 'wrap', gap: 8 },
+  setorBadge: { backgroundColor: '#E8F1FF', paddingVertical: 6, paddingHorizontal: 12, borderRadius: 15 },
+  setorText: { color: '#007BFF', fontWeight: '600' },
+  listItem: {
+    flexDirection: 'row',
+    alignItems: 'center',
+    backgroundColor: '#fff',
+    borderRadius: 10,
+    padding: 12,
+    marginBottom: 8,
+    borderWidth: 1,
+    borderColor: '#E2E8F0',
+  },
+  listItemName: { fontSize: 16, fontWeight: '600', color: '#1E2A38' },
+  listItemDetails: { fontSize: 14, color: '#555' },
+  emptyText: { textAlign: 'center', color: '#777', fontSize: 15, marginVertical: 10 },
+  actionsContainer: { flexDirection: 'row', justifyContent: 'space-around', marginTop: 10 },
+  actionButton: {
+    flexDirection: 'row',
+    alignItems: 'center',
+    backgroundColor: '#007BFF',
+    paddingVertical: 12,
+    paddingHorizontal: 20,
+    borderRadius: 10,
+  },
+  actionText: { color: '#fff', fontSize: 16, fontWeight: '600', marginLeft: 6 },
+  modalContainer: { flex: 1, justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', backgroundColor: 'rgba(0,0,0,0.5)' },
+  modalView: {
+    width: '90%',
+    backgroundColor: '#fff',
+    borderRadius: 20,
+    padding: 25,
+    alignItems: 'center',
+  },
+  modalTitle: { fontSize: 20, fontWeight: '700', marginBottom: 15, color: '#1E2A38' },
+  modalInput: {
+    width: '100%',
+    height: 45,
+    backgroundColor: '#F9FAFB',
+    borderWidth: 1,
+    borderColor: '#D1D9E6',
+    borderRadius: 10,
+    paddingHorizontal: 12,
+    marginBottom: 10,
+    fontSize: 16,
+    color: '#333',
+  },
+  modalButton: {
+    flexDirection: 'row',
+    backgroundColor: '#007BFF',
+    paddingVertical: 12,
+    paddingHorizontal: 20,
+    borderRadius: 10,
+    alignItems: 'center',
+    justifyContent: 'center',
+    width: '100%',
+  },
+  modalButtonText: { color: '#fff', fontWeight: '700', fontSize: 16 },
+  cancelButton: { marginTop: 10 },
+  cancelText: { color: '#007BFF', fontWeight: '600', fontSize: 15 },
+});

+import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react';
+import { View, Text, TouchableOpacity, FlatList, Modal, TextInput, StyleSheet, Alert, ScrollView } from 'react-native';
+import { View, Text, TouchableOpacity, Modal, TextInput, StyleSheet, Alert, ScrollView } from 'react-native';
+import { Ionicons } from '@expo/vector-icons';
+import { useIsFocused, useNavigation } from '@react-navigation/native';
+import { LinearGradient } from 'expo-linear-gradient';
+import { addFuncionario, getFuncionarios } from '@/sqLite/SQLiteConecction';
+
+export default function Home() {
+  const navigation = useNavigation();
+  const isFocused = useIsFocused();
+
+  const [funcionarios, setFuncionarios] = useState([]);
+  const [modalVisible, setModalVisible] = useState(false);
+  const [newEmployee, setNewEmployee] = useState({ nome: '', re: '', setor: '' });
+
+  // Carrega os funcion√°rios do banco
+  const loadData = async () => {
+    const data = await getFuncionarios();
+    setFuncionarios(data);
+  };
+
+  useEffect(() => {
+    if (isFocused) loadData();
+  }, [isFocused]);
+
+  // Dados do dashboard
+  const total = funcionarios.length;
+  const setores = [...new Set(funcionarios.map(f => f.setor))];
+  const ultimos = funcionarios.slice(-3).reverse();
+
+  const handleAdd = async () => {
+    if (!newEmployee.nome || !newEmployee.re || !newEmployee.setor) {
+      return Alert.alert('Erro', 'Por favor, preencha todos os campos.');
+    }
+    await addFuncionario(newEmployee.nome, newEmployee.re, newEmployee.setor);
+    setNewEmployee({ nome: '', re: '', setor: '' });
+    setModalVisible(false);
+    await loadData();
+  };
+
+  return (
+    <LinearGradient colors={['#F5F9FF', '#FFFFFF']} style={styles.container}>
+      <ScrollView contentContainerStyle={styles.scrollContainer} showsVerticalScrollIndicator={false}>
+        <Text style={styles.greeting}>üëã Ol√°, bem-vindo!</Text>
+
+        {/* Se√ß√£o de vis√£o geral */}
+        <Text style={styles.sectionTitle}>üìä Vis√£o Geral</Text>
+        <View style={styles.cardsContainer}>
+          <View style={styles.card}>
+            <Ionicons name="people-outline" size={24} color="#007BFF" />
+            <Text style={styles.cardTitle}>Funcion√°rios</Text>
+            <Text style={styles.cardNumber}>{total}</Text>
+          </View>
+          <View style={styles.card}>
+            <Ionicons name="business-outline" size={24} color="#28A745" />
+            <Text style={styles.cardTitle}>Setores</Text>
+            <Text style={styles.cardNumber}>{setores.length}</Text>
+          </View>
+          <View style={styles.card}>
+            <Ionicons name="time-outline" size={24} color="#FFC107" />
+            <Text style={styles.cardTitle}>√öltimo cadastrado</Text>
+            <Text style={styles.cardSmall}>
+              {funcionarios.length > 0 ? funcionarios[funcionarios.length - 1].nome : '‚Äî'}
+            </Text>
+          </View>
+        </View>
+
+        {/* Setores cadastrados */}
+        <Text style={styles.sectionTitle}>üè≠ Setores</Text>
+        {setores.length > 0 ? (
+          <View style={styles.setoresContainer}>
+            {setores.map((s, i) => (
+              <View key={i} style={styles.setorBadge}>
+                <Text style={styles.setorText}>{s}</Text>
+              </View>
+            ))}
+          </View>
+        ) : (
+          <Text style={styles.emptyText}>Nenhum setor cadastrado ainda.</Text>
+        )}
+
+        {/* √öltimos adicionados */}
+        <Text style={styles.sectionTitle}>üïí √öltimos adicionados</Text>
+        {ultimos.length > 0 ? (
+          <FlatList
+            data={ultimos}
+            keyExtractor={item => item.id.toString()}
+            renderItem={({ item }) => (
+              <View style={styles.listItem}>
+          <View>
+            {ultimos.map(item => (
+              <View key={item.id.toString()} style={styles.listItem}>
+                <Ionicons name="person-circle-outline" size={26} color="#007BFF" />
+                <View style={{ marginLeft: 10 }}>
+                  <Text style={styles.listItemName}>{item.nome}</Text>
+                  <Text style={styles.listItemDetails}>RE: {item.re} | {item.setor}</Text>
+                </View>
+              </View>
+            )}
+          />
+            ))}
+          </View>
+        ) : (
+          <Text style={styles.emptyText}>Nenhum funcion√°rio cadastrado.</Text>
+        )}
+
+        {/* A√ß√µes r√°pidas */}
+        <Text style={styles.sectionTitle}>‚öôÔ∏è A√ß√µes r√°pidas</Text>
+        <View style={styles.actionsContainer}>
+          <TouchableOpacity style={styles.actionButton} onPress={() => setModalVisible(true)}>
+            <Ionicons name="add-outline" size={22} color="#fff" />
+            <Text style={styles.actionText}>Adicionar</Text>
+          </TouchableOpacity>
+          <TouchableOpacity
+            style={[styles.actionButton, { backgroundColor: '#6C63FF' }]}
+            onPress={() => navigation.navigate('Employes')}
+          >
+            <Ionicons name="list-outline" size={22} color="#fff" />
+            <Text style={styles.actionText}>Ver Todos</Text>
+          </TouchableOpacity>
+        </View>
+      </ScrollView>
+
+      {/* Modal de cadastro */}
+      <Modal visible={modalVisible} animationType="slide" transparent={true} onRequestClose={() => setModalVisible(false)}>
+        <View style={styles.modalContainer}>
+          <View style={styles.modalView}>
+            <Text style={styles.modalTitle}>Adicionar Funcion√°rio</Text>
+            <TextInput
+              placeholder="Nome"
+              value={newEmployee.nome}
+              onChangeText={text => setNewEmployee({ ...newEmployee, nome: text })}
+              style={styles.modalInput}
+            />
+            <TextInput
+              placeholder="RE"
+              value={newEmployee.re}
+              onChangeText={text => setNewEmployee({ ...newEmployee, re: text })}
+              style={styles.modalInput}
+              keyboardType="numeric"
+            />
+            <TextInput
+              placeholder="Setor"
+              value={newEmployee.setor}
+              onChangeText={text => setNewEmployee({ ...newEmployee, setor: text })}
+              style={styles.modalInput}
+            />
+            <TouchableOpacity style={styles.modalButton} onPress={handleAdd}>
+              <Ionicons name="save-outline" size={20} color="#fff" style={{ marginRight: 6 }} />
+              <Text style={styles.modalButtonText}>Salvar</Text>
+            </TouchableOpacity>
+            <TouchableOpacity onPress={() => setModalVisible(false)} style={styles.cancelButton}>
+              <Text style={styles.cancelText}>Cancelar</Text>
+            </TouchableOpacity>
+          </View>
+        </View>
+      </Modal>
+    </LinearGradient>
+  );
+}
+
+const styles = StyleSheet.create({
+  container: { flex: 1 },
+  scrollContainer: { padding: 20, paddingBottom: 50 },
+  greeting: { fontSize: 24, fontWeight: '700', color: '#1E2A38', marginBottom: 15 },
+  sectionTitle: { fontSize: 18, fontWeight: '600', color: '#1E2A38', marginTop: 20, marginBottom: 10 },
+  cardsContainer: { flexDirection: 'row', justifyContent: 'space-between', flexWrap: 'wrap', gap: 10 },
+  card: {
+    backgroundColor: '#fff',
+    flexBasis: '31%',
+    padding: 15,
+    borderRadius: 12,
+    alignItems: 'center',
+    borderWidth: 1,
+    borderColor: '#E2E8F0',
+  },
+  cardTitle: { fontSize: 14, color: '#555', marginTop: 8 },
+  cardNumber: { fontSize: 22, fontWeight: '700', color: '#1E2A38', marginTop: 4 },
+  cardSmall: { fontSize: 14, fontWeight: '600', color: '#1E2A38', marginTop: 4 },
+  setoresContainer: { flexDirection: 'row', flexWrap: 'wrap', gap: 8 },
+  setorBadge: { backgroundColor: '#E8F1FF', paddingVertical: 6, paddingHorizontal: 12, borderRadius: 15 },
+  setorText: { color: '#007BFF', fontWeight: '600' },
+  listItem: {
+    flexDirection: 'row',
+    alignItems: 'center',
+    backgroundColor: '#fff',
+    borderRadius: 10,
+    padding: 12,
+    marginBottom: 8,
+    borderWidth: 1,
+    borderColor: '#E2E8F0',
+  },
+  listItemName: { fontSize: 16, fontWeight: '600', color: '#1E2A38' },
+  listItemDetails: { fontSize: 14, color: '#555' },
+  emptyText: { textAlign: 'center', color: '#777', fontSize: 15, marginVertical: 10 },
+  actionsContainer: { flexDirection: 'row', justifyContent: 'space-around', marginTop: 10 },

+    flexDirection: 'row',
+    alignItems: 'center',
+    backgroundColor: '#007BFF',

+    paddingHorizontal: 20,
+    borderRadius: 10,
+  },
+  actionText: { color: '#fff', fontSize: 16, fontWeight: '600', marginLeft: 6 },

+  modalView: {
+    width: '90%',
+    backgroundColor: '#fff',
+    borderRadius: 20,
+    padding: 25,
+    alignItems: 'center',
+  },

+  modalInput: {
+    width: '100%',
+    height: 45,
+    backgroundColor: '#F9FAFB',
+    borderWidth: 1,
+    borderColor: '#D1D9E6',
+    borderRadius: 10,
+    paddingHorizontal: 12,
+    marginBottom: 10,
+    fontSize: 16,
+    color: '#333',
+  },
+  modalButton: {
+    flexDirection: 'row',
+    backgroundColor: '#007BFF',
+    paddingVertical: 12,
+    paddingHorizontal: 20,
+    borderRadius: 10,
+    alignItems: 'center',
+    justifyContent: 'center',
+    width: '100%',
+  },
+  modalButtonText: { color: '#fff', fontWeight: '700', fontSize: 16 },

@@ -0,0 +1,234 @@
+import { addFuncionario, getFuncionarios } from '@/sqLite/SQLiteConecction';
+import { Ionicons } from '@expo/vector-icons';
+import { useIsFocused, useNavigation } from '@react-navigation/native';
+import { LinearGradient } from 'expo-linear-gradient';
+import { useEffect, useState } from 'react';
+import { Alert, Modal, ScrollView, StyleSheet, Text, TextInput, TouchableOpacity, View } from 'react-native';
+
+export default function Home() {
+  const navigation = useNavigation();
+  const isFocused = useIsFocused();
+
+  const [funcionarios, setFuncionarios] = useState([]);
+  const [modalVisible, setModalVisible] = useState(false);
+  const [newEmployee, setNewEmployee] = useState({ nome: '', re: '', setor: '' });
+
+  // Carrega os funcion√°rios do banco
+  const loadData = async () => {
+    const data = await getFuncionarios();
+    setFuncionarios(data);
+  };
+
+  useEffect(() => {
+    if (isFocused) loadData();
+  }, [isFocused]);
+
+  // Dados do dashboard
+  const total = funcionarios.length;
+  const setores = [...new Set(funcionarios.map(f => f.setor))];
+  const ultimos = funcionarios.slice(-3).reverse();
+
+  const handleAdd = async () => {
+    if (!newEmployee.nome || !newEmployee.re || !newEmployee.setor) {
+      return Alert.alert('Erro', 'Por favor, preencha todos os campos.');
+    }
+    await addFuncionario(newEmployee.nome, newEmployee.re, newEmployee.setor);
+    setNewEmployee({ nome: '', re: '', setor: '' });
+    setModalVisible(false);
+    await loadData();
+  };
+
+  return (
+    <LinearGradient colors={['#F5F9FF', '#FFFFFF']} style={styles.container}>
+      <ScrollView contentContainerStyle={styles.scrollContainer} showsVerticalScrollIndicator={false}>
+        <Text style={styles.greeting}>üëã Ol√°, bem-vindo!</Text>
+
+        {/* Se√ß√£o de vis√£o geral */}
+        <Text style={styles.sectionTitle}>üìä Vis√£o Geral</Text>
+        <View style={styles.cardsContainer}>
+          <View style={styles.card}>
+            <Ionicons name="people-outline" size={24} color="#007BFF" />
+            <Text style={styles.cardTitle}>Funcion√°rios</Text>
+            <Text style={styles.cardNumber}>{total}</Text>
+          </View>
+          <View style={styles.card}>
+            <Ionicons name="business-outline" size={24} color="#28A745" />
+            <Text style={styles.cardTitle}>Setores</Text>
+            <Text style={styles.cardNumber}>{setores.length}</Text>
+          </View>
+          <View style={styles.card}>
+            <Ionicons name="time-outline" size={24} color="#FFC107" />
+            <Text style={styles.cardTitle}>√öltimo cadastrado</Text>
+            <Text style={styles.cardSmall}>
+              {funcionarios.length > 0 ? funcionarios[funcionarios.length - 1].nome : '‚Äî'}
+            </Text>
+          </View>
+        </View>
+
+        {/* Setores cadastrados */}
+        <Text style={styles.sectionTitle}>üè≠ Setores</Text>
+        {setores.length > 0 ? (
+          <View style={styles.setoresContainer}>
+            {setores.map((s, i) => (
+              <View key={i} style={styles.setorBadge}>
+                <Text style={styles.setorText}>{s}</Text>
+              </View>
+            ))}
+          </View>
+        ) : (
+          <Text style={styles.emptyText}>Nenhum setor cadastrado ainda.</Text>
+        )}
+
+        {/* √öltimos adicionados */}
+        <Text style={styles.sectionTitle}>üïí √öltimos adicionados</Text>
+        {ultimos.length > 0 ? (
+          <View>
+            {ultimos.map(item => (
+              <View key={item.id.toString()} style={styles.listItem}>
+                <Ionicons name="person-circle-outline" size={26} color="#007BFF" />
+                <View style={{ marginLeft: 10 }}>
+                  <Text style={styles.listItemName}>{item.nome}</Text>
+                  <Text style={styles.listItemDetails}>RE: {item.re} | {item.setor}</Text>
+                </View>
+              </View>
+            ))}
+          </View>
+        ) : (
+          <Text style={styles.emptyText}>Nenhum funcion√°rio cadastrado.</Text>
+        )}
+
+        {/* A√ß√µes r√°pidas */}
+        <Text style={styles.sectionTitle}>‚öôÔ∏è A√ß√µes r√°pidas</Text>
+        <View style={styles.actionsContainer}>
+          <TouchableOpacity style={styles.actionButton} onPress={() => setModalVisible(true)}>
+            <Ionicons name="add-outline" size={22} color="#fff" />
+            <Text style={styles.actionText}>Adicionar</Text>
+          </TouchableOpacity>
+          <TouchableOpacity
+            style={[styles.actionButton, { backgroundColor: '#6C63FF' }]}
+            onPress={() => navigation.navigate('Employes')}
+          >
+            <Ionicons name="list-outline" size={22} color="#fff" />
+            <Text style={styles.actionText}>Ver Todos</Text>
+          </TouchableOpacity>
+        </View>
+      </ScrollView>
+
+      {/* Modal de cadastro */}
+      <Modal visible={modalVisible} animationType="slide" transparent={true} onRequestClose={() => setModalVisible(false)}>
+        <View style={styles.modalContainer}>
+          <View style={styles.modalView}>
+            <Text style={styles.modalTitle}>Adicionar Funcion√°rio</Text>
+            <TextInput
+              placeholder="Nome"
+              value={newEmployee.nome}
+              onChangeText={text => setNewEmployee({ ...newEmployee, nome: text })}
+              style={styles.modalInput}
+            />
+            <TextInput
+              placeholder="RE"
+              value={newEmployee.re}
+              onChangeText={text => setNewEmployee({ ...newEmployee, re: text })}
+              style={styles.modalInput}
+              keyboardType="numeric"
+            />
+            <TextInput
+              placeholder="Setor"
+              value={newEmployee.setor}
+              onChangeText={text => setNewEmployee({ ...newEmployee, setor: text })}
+              style={styles.modalInput}
+            />
+            <TouchableOpacity style={styles.modalButton} onPress={handleAdd}>
+              <Ionicons name="save-outline" size={20} color="#fff" style={{ marginRight: 6 }} />
+              <Text style={styles.modalButtonText}>Salvar</Text>
+            </TouchableOpacity>
+            <TouchableOpacity onPress={() => setModalVisible(false)} style={styles.cancelButton}>
+              <Text style={styles.cancelText}>Cancelar</Text>
+            </TouchableOpacity>
+          </View>
+        </View>
+      </Modal>
+    </LinearGradient>
+  );
+}
+
+const styles = StyleSheet.create({
+  container: { flex: 1 },
+  scrollContainer: { padding: 20, paddingBottom: 50 },
+  greeting: { fontSize: 24, fontWeight: '700', color: '#1E2A38', marginBottom: 15 },
+  sectionTitle: { fontSize: 18, fontWeight: '600', color: '#1E2A38', marginTop: 20, marginBottom: 10 },
+  cardsContainer: { flexDirection: 'row', justifyContent: 'space-between', flexWrap: 'wrap', gap: 10 },
+  cardsContainer: { flexDirection: 'row', flexWrap: 'wrap', gap: 10 },
+  card: {
+    backgroundColor: '#fff',
+    flexBasis: '31%',
+    padding: 15,
+    borderRadius: 12,
+    alignItems: 'center',
+    borderWidth: 1,
+    borderColor: '#E2E8F0',
+  },
+  cardTitle: { fontSize: 14, color: '#555', marginTop: 8 },
+  cardNumber: { fontSize: 22, fontWeight: '700', color: '#1E2A38', marginTop: 4 },
+  cardSmall: { fontSize: 14, fontWeight: '600', color: '#1E2A38', marginTop: 4 },
+  setoresContainer: { flexDirection: 'row', flexWrap: 'wrap', gap: 8 },
+  setorBadge: { backgroundColor: '#E8F1FF', paddingVertical: 6, paddingHorizontal: 12, borderRadius: 15 },
+  setorText: { color: '#007BFF', fontWeight: '600' },
+  listItem: {
+    flexDirection: 'row',
+    alignItems: 'center',
+    backgroundColor: '#fff',
+    borderRadius: 10,
+    padding: 12,
+    marginBottom: 8,
+    borderWidth: 1,
+    borderColor: '#E2E8F0',
+  },
+  listItemName: { fontSize: 16, fontWeight: '600', color: '#1E2A38' },
+  listItemDetails: { fontSize: 14, color: '#555' },
+  emptyText: { textAlign: 'center', color: '#777', fontSize: 15, marginVertical: 10 },
+  actionsContainer: { flexDirection: 'row', justifyContent: 'space-around', marginTop: 10 },
+  actionButton: {
+    flexDirection: 'row',
+    alignItems: 'center',
+    backgroundColor: '#007BFF',
+    paddingVertical: 12,
+    paddingHorizontal: 20,
+    borderRadius: 10,
+  },
+  actionText: { color: '#fff', fontSize: 16, fontWeight: '600', marginLeft: 6 },
+  modalContainer: { flex: 1, justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', backgroundColor: 'rgba(0,0,0,0.5)' },
+  modalView: {
+    width: '90%',
+    backgroundColor: '#fff',
+    borderRadius: 20,
+    padding: 25,
+    alignItems: 'center',
+  },
+  modalTitle: { fontSize: 20, fontWeight: '700', marginBottom: 15, color: '#1E2A38' },
+  modalInput: {
+    width: '100%',
+    height: 45,
+    backgroundColor: '#F9FAFB',
+    borderWidth: 1,
+    borderColor: '#D1D9E6',
+    borderRadius: 10,
+    paddingHorizontal: 12,
+    marginBottom: 10,
+    fontSize: 16,
+    color: '#333',
+  },
+  modalButton: {
+    flexDirection: 'row',
+    backgroundColor: '#007BFF',
+    paddingVertical: 12,
+    paddingHorizontal: 20,
+    borderRadius: 10,
+    alignItems: 'center',
+    justifyContent: 'center',
+    width: '100%',
+  },
+  modalButtonText: { color: '#fff', fontWeight: '700', fontSize: 16 },
+  cancelButton: { marginTop: 10 },
+  cancelText: { color: '#007BFF', fontWeight: '600', fontSize: 15 },
+});

+}

@@ -0,0 +1,284 @@
+import { addFuncionario, getFuncionarios } from '@/sqLite/SQLiteConecction';
+import { Ionicons } from '@expo/vector-icons';
+import { useIsFocused, useNavigation } from '@react-navigation/native';
+import { LinearGradient } from 'expo-linear-gradient';
+import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react';
+import {
+  Alert,
+  FlatList,
+  Keyboard,
+  KeyboardAvoidingView,
+  Modal,
+  Platform,
+  ScrollView,
+  StyleSheet,
+  Text,
+  TextInput,
+  TouchableOpacity,
+  View
+} from 'react-native';
+
+export default function Home() {
+  const navigation = useNavigation();
+  const isFocused = useIsFocused();
+
+  const [funcionarios, setFuncionarios] = useState([]);
+  const [modalVisible, setModalVisible] = useState(false);
+  const [newEmployee, setNewEmployee] = useState({ nome: '', re: '', setor: '' });
+
+  // üîπ Carrega os funcion√°rios do banco com tratamento de erro
+  const loadData = async () => {
+    try {
+      const data = await getFuncionarios();
+      setFuncionarios(data);
+    } catch (error) {
+      console.error("Erro ao carregar dados:", error);
+      Alert.alert("Erro", "N√£o foi poss√≠vel carregar os funcion√°rios.");
+    }
+  };
+
+  useEffect(() => {
+    if (isFocused) loadData();
+  }, [isFocused]);
+
+  // üîπ Dados do dashboard
+  const total = funcionarios.length;
+  const setores = [...new Set(funcionarios.map(f => f.setor))];
+  const ultimos = funcionarios.slice(-3).reverse();
+
+  // üîπ Adicionar funcion√°rio
+  const handleAdd = async () => {
+    if (!newEmployee.nome || !newEmployee.re || !newEmployee.setor) {
+      return Alert.alert('Erro', 'Por favor, preencha todos os campos.');
+    }
+
+    try {
+      await addFuncionario(newEmployee.nome, newEmployee.re, newEmployee.setor);
+      setNewEmployee({ nome: '', re: '', setor: '' });
+      setModalVisible(false);
+      Keyboard.dismiss();
+      await loadData();
+      Alert.alert("Sucesso", "Funcion√°rio adicionado com sucesso!");
+    } catch (error) {
+      console.error("Erro ao adicionar funcion√°rio:", error);
+      Alert.alert("Erro", "N√£o foi poss√≠vel salvar o funcion√°rio.");
+    }
+  };
+
+  return (
+    <LinearGradient colors={['#F5F9FF', '#FFFFFF']} style={styles.container}>
+      <ScrollView contentContainerStyle={styles.scrollContainer} showsVerticalScrollIndicator={false}>
+        <Text style={styles.greeting}>üëã Ol√°, bem-vindo!</Text>
+
+        {/* üîπ Se√ß√£o de vis√£o geral */}
+        <Text style={styles.sectionTitle}>üìä Vis√£o Geral</Text>
+        <View style={styles.cardsContainer}>
+          <View style={styles.card}>
+            <Ionicons name="people-outline" size={24} color="#007BFF" />
+            <Text style={styles.cardTitle}>Funcion√°rios</Text>
+            <Text style={styles.cardNumber}>{total}</Text>
+          </View>
+
+          <View style={styles.card}>
+            <Ionicons name="business-outline" size={24} color="#28A745" />
+            <Text style={styles.cardTitle}>Setores</Text>
+            <Text style={styles.cardNumber}>{setores.length}</Text>
+          </View>
+
+          <View style={styles.card}>
+            <Ionicons name="time-outline" size={24} color="#FFC107" />
+            <Text style={styles.cardTitle}>√öltimo cadastrado</Text>
+            <Text
+              style={styles.cardSmall}
+              numberOfLines={2}
+              ellipsizeMode="tail"
+            >
+              {funcionarios.length > 0 ? funcionarios[funcionarios.length - 1].nome : '‚Äî'}
+            </Text>
+          </View>
+        </View>
+
+        {/* üîπ Setores cadastrados */}
+        <Text style={styles.sectionTitle}>üè≠ Setores</Text>
+        {setores.length > 0 ? (
+          <View style={styles.setoresContainer}>
+            {setores.map((s, i) => (
+              <View key={i} style={styles.setorBadge}>
+                <Text style={styles.setorText}>{s}</Text>
+              </View>
+            ))}
+          </View>
+        ) : (
+          <Text style={styles.emptyText}>Nenhum setor cadastrado ainda.</Text>
+        )}
+
+        {/* üîπ √öltimos adicionados */}
+        <Text style={styles.sectionTitle}>üïí √öltimos adicionados</Text>
+        {ultimos.length > 0 ? (
+          <FlatList
+            data={ultimos}
+            keyExtractor={item => item.id.toString()}
+            renderItem={({ item }) => (
+              <View style={styles.listItem}>
+                <Ionicons name="person-circle-outline" size={26} color="#007BFF" />
+                <View style={{ marginLeft: 10 }}>
+                  <Text style={styles.listItemName}>{item.nome}</Text>
+                  <Text style={styles.listItemDetails}>RE: {item.re} | {item.setor}</Text>
+                </View>
+              </View>
+            )}
+          />
+        ) : (
+          <Text style={styles.emptyText}>Nenhum funcion√°rio cadastrado.</Text>
+        )}
+
+        {/* üîπ A√ß√µes r√°pidas */}
+        <Text style={styles.sectionTitle}>‚öôÔ∏è A√ß√µes r√°pidas</Text>
+        <View style={styles.actionsContainer}>
+          <TouchableOpacity style={styles.actionButton} onPress={() => setModalVisible(true)}>
+            <Ionicons name="add-outline" size={22} color="#fff" />
+            <Text style={styles.actionText}>Adicionar</Text>
+          </TouchableOpacity>
+
+          <TouchableOpacity
+            style={[styles.actionButton, { backgroundColor: '#6C63FF' }]}
+            onPress={() => navigation.navigate('Employes')}
+          >
+            <Ionicons name="list-outline" size={22} color="#fff" />
+            <Text style={styles.actionText}>Ver Todos</Text>
+          </TouchableOpacity>
+        </View>
+      </ScrollView>
+
+      {/* üîπ Modal de cadastro com KeyboardAvoidingView */}
+      <Modal visible={modalVisible} animationType="slide" transparent={true} onRequestClose={() => setModalVisible(false)}>
+        <KeyboardAvoidingView
+          behavior={Platform.OS === 'ios' ? 'padding' : 'height'}
+          style={styles.modalContainer}
+        >
+          <View style={styles.modalView}>
+            <Text style={styles.modalTitle}>Adicionar Funcion√°rio</Text>
+
+            <TextInput
+              placeholder="Nome"
+              value={newEmployee.nome}
+              onChangeText={text => setNewEmployee({ ...newEmployee, nome: text })}
+              style={styles.modalInput}
+            />
+            <TextInput
+              placeholder="RE"
+              value={newEmployee.re}
+              onChangeText={text => setNewEmployee({ ...newEmployee, re: text })}
+              style={styles.modalInput}
+              keyboardType="numeric"
+            />
+            <TextInput
+              placeholder="Setor"
+              value={newEmployee.setor}
+              onChangeText={text => setNewEmployee({ ...newEmployee, setor: text })}
+              style={styles.modalInput}
+            />
+
+            <TouchableOpacity style={styles.modalButton} onPress={handleAdd}>
+              <Ionicons name="save-outline" size={20} color="#fff" style={{ marginRight: 6 }} />
+              <Text style={styles.modalButtonText}>Salvar</Text>
+            </TouchableOpacity>
+
+            <TouchableOpacity onPress={() => setModalVisible(false)} style={styles.cancelButton}>
+              <Text style={styles.cancelText}>Cancelar</Text>
+            </TouchableOpacity>
+          </View>
+        </KeyboardAvoidingView>
+      </Modal>
+    </LinearGradient>
+  );
+}
+
+const styles = StyleSheet.create({
+  container: { flex: 1 },
+  scrollContainer: { padding: 20, paddingBottom: 50 },
+  greeting: { fontSize: 24, fontWeight: '700', color: '#1E2A38', marginBottom: 15 },
+  sectionTitle: { fontSize: 18, fontWeight: '600', color: '#1E2A38', marginTop: 20, marginBottom: 10 },
+
+  // üîπ Corrigido: substitui√ß√£o do gap
+  cardsContainer: { flexDirection: 'row', flexWrap: 'wrap', justifyContent: 'space-between' },
+  card: {
+    backgroundColor: '#fff',
+    width: '31%',
+    marginBottom: 10,
+    padding: 15,
+    borderRadius: 12,
+    justifyContent: 'space-between',
+    borderWidth: 1,
+    borderColor: '#E2E8F0',
+    minHeight: 110,
+  },
+
+  cardTitle: { fontSize: 14, color: '#555', marginTop: 8, textAlign: 'center' },
+  cardNumber: { fontSize: 22, fontWeight: '700', color: '#1E2A38', marginTop: 4, textAlign: 'center' },
+  cardSmall: { fontSize: 14, fontWeight: '600', color: '#1E2A38', marginTop: 4, textAlign: 'center' },
+
+  setoresContainer: { flexDirection: 'row', flexWrap: 'wrap', marginHorizontal: -4 },
+  setorBadge: { backgroundColor: '#E8F1FF', paddingVertical: 6, paddingHorizontal: 12, borderRadius: 15, margin: 4 },
+  setorText: { color: '#007BFF', fontWeight: '600' },
+
+  listItem: {
+    flexDirection: 'row',
+    alignItems: 'center',
+    backgroundColor: '#fff',
+    borderRadius: 10,
+    padding: 12,
+    marginBottom: 8,
+    borderWidth: 1,
+    borderColor: '#E2E8F0',
+  },
+  listItemName: { fontSize: 16, fontWeight: '600', color: '#1E2A38' },
+  listItemDetails: { fontSize: 14, color: '#555' },
+  emptyText: { textAlign: 'center', color: '#777', fontSize: 15, marginVertical: 10 },
+
+  actionsContainer: { flexDirection: 'row', justifyContent: 'space-around', marginTop: 10 },
+  actionButton: {
+    flexDirection: 'row',
+    alignItems: 'center',
+    backgroundColor: '#007BFF',
+    paddingVertical: 12,
+    paddingHorizontal: 20,
+    borderRadius: 10,
+  },
+  actionText: { color: '#fff', fontSize: 16, fontWeight: '600', marginLeft: 6 },
+
+  modalContainer: { flex: 1, justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', backgroundColor: 'rgba(0,0,0,0.5)' },
+  modalView: {
+    width: '90%',
+    backgroundColor: '#fff',
+    borderRadius: 20,
+    padding: 25,
+    alignItems: 'center',
+  },
+  modalTitle: { fontSize: 20, fontWeight: '700', marginBottom: 15, color: '#1E2A38' },
+  modalInput: {
+    width: '100%',
+    height: 45,
+    backgroundColor: '#F9FAFB',
+    borderWidth: 1,
+    borderColor: '#D1D9E6',
+    borderRadius: 10,
+    paddingHorizontal: 12,
+    marginBottom: 10,
+    fontSize: 16,
+    color: '#333',
+  },
+  modalButton: {
+    flexDirection: 'row',
+    backgroundColor: '#007BFF',
+    paddingVertical: 12,
+    paddingHorizontal: 20,
+    borderRadius: 10,
+    alignItems: 'center',
+    justifyContent: 'center',
+    width: '100%',
+  },
+  modalButtonText: { color: '#fff', fontWeight: '700', fontSize: 16 },
+  cancelButton: { marginTop: 10 },
+  cancelText: { color: '#007BFF', fontWeight: '600', fontSize: 15 },
+});

commits.name: Commit-0
